heading: HB05329
0: AN ACT ALLOWING TRICYCLES TO TRAVEL BEYOND THE REGULAR ROUTE OF SERVICE AS EMBODIED IN THEIR FRANCHISE IN EMERGENCY CASES AS DETERMINED BY CONCERNED GOVERNMENT AUTHORITY AND PROVIDING PENALTIES FOR ANY VIOLATION THEREOF
status: Pending with the Committee on TRANSPORTATION since 2019-11-12
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05329
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ALLOWING TRICYCLES TO TRAVEL BEYOND THE REGULAR ROUTE OF SERVICE AS EMBODIED IN THEIR FRANCHISE IN EMERGENCY CASES AS DETERMINED BY CONCERNED GOVERNMENT AUTHORITY AND PROVIDING PENALTIES FOR ANY VIOLATION THEREOF

DATE FILED : 2019-11-05
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
